casebody.data:
TULLY
v.
CITY OF WILMINGTON 348A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2016

Katherine Lewis Parker, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, S. Luke Largess, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For Tully, Kevin J.

Katie Weaver Hartzog, Attorney at Law, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For City of Wilmington.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of November 2016 by Plaintiff for Withdrawal of Appearance and for Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2016."
